lead_paragraph: A Paris museum that last month was the site of a burglary of five paintings will reopen on June 10, Agence France-Presse reported.
snippet: A Paris museum that last month was the site of a burglary of five paintings will reopen on June 10, Agence France-Presse reported.

headline.main: After Theft, Paris Museum Is to Reopen
headline.print_headline: Arts, Briefly: After Theft, Paris Museum Is to Reopen
